attributes.action: Begin talks with the EU about admission into the CPTPP among threats from tariff
attributes.additional_details: Whether we like it or not, the EU are our allies but likewise we never truly belonged with them. This situation is an unprecedented opportunity to not only bring some stability back to our markets but also bring alliances old and new together in 1 agreement.
attributes.background: Brexit was a major issue and has caused no ends of problems for the UK and EU businesses, as we fully joined the CPTPP in December we can offer to ratify them in exchange for Free Trade similarly as before while retaining our sovereignty to reduce damage of the tariffs from the USA.

rejection.details: The decision to apply to join the CPTPP is a matter for the EU.
